title: games crashs (bug splat)
body: I played yesterday without a problem and i just switched to a 50 inch tv from a 32 inch tv and now every time I go into loading screen it crashes. Does anyone know whats going on here?

replies.body: Does this happen with any other game?  Your resolution here might just be too big.  For example, 4K is a setting we don't currently support and can cause issues like this or with your resolution.  There could also be a problem with the cable as well that may work well on one screen but not another.  Additionally, there may be outdated driver problems if you are getting bugsplat errors.  Beyond using a smaller monitor, I'd suggest going over our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to help with resolving the bugsplat.  I hope that helps!

its happened to me too.. I'd recommend doing a custom game try switching back and when you are in game change the resolution settings or google how to change settings outside of league and format the file for resolution.
i just tried my 32 inch and it starts up fine but when i switched the hdmi cable back when the game was running it crashed again.
